text: Ayatollah Ali Meshkini (1922-30 July 2007) was the chairman of the Assembly of Experts of the Islamic Republic of Iran from 1984 to 2007. ==Other websites== * Ayatollah Meshkini In A Friday Sermon in Qom: An Islamic Rule Under Ayatollah Sistani Is Required in Iraq , video clip, 2004 Category:Iranian Islamic religious leaders Category:1922 births Category:2007 deaths Category:Legislative speakers
title: Ali Meshkini
